briefdescription.para: Cut items.
Copy items.
Clipboard operations.
Paste items at cursor position.
Paste items in center of view.
Paste items in place.
Paste modes.
Constructor for QgsLayoutView.
Aligns all selected items using the specified alignment.
Cuts or copies the a list of items, respecting the specified operation.
Cuts or copies the selected items, respecting the specified operation.
Returns the current layout associated with the view.
Returns the current layout associated with the view.
Returns the page visible in the view.

detaileddescription.para:
This method considers the page at the center of the view as the current visible page.
pageChanged()

briefdescription.para: Returns the delta (in layout coordinates) by which to move items for the given key event.
Distributes all selected items using the specified distribution.
Returns true if the current clipboard contains layout items.
Returns the provider for context menus.

detaileddescription.para:
Returned value may be nullptr if no provider is set.
setMenuProvider()

briefdescription.para: Pastes items from clipboard, using the specified mode.

detaileddescription.para: A list of pasted items is returned.

briefdescription.para: Pastes items from clipboard, at the specified layoutPoint, in layout units.

detaileddescription.para: A list of pasted items is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the preview mode which may be used to modify the view's appearance.

detaileddescription.para:
Preview modes are only used if previewModeEnabled() is true.
setPreviewMode()
previewModeEnabled()

briefdescription.para: Returns true if a preview effect is being used to alter the view's appearance.
Resizes all selected items using the specified resize mode.
Scales the view in a safe way, by limiting the acceptable range of the scale applied.

detaileddescription.para: The scale parameter specifies the zoom factor to scale the view by.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current layout to edit in the view.
Sets a horizontal ruler to synchronize with the view state.
Sets a provider for context menus.

detaileddescription.para:
Ownership of the provider is transferred to the view.
menuProvider()

briefdescription.para: Sets whether widget repainting should be allowed for the view.

detaileddescription.para:
This is used to temporarily halt painting while exporting layouts.
Not available in Python bindings.

briefdescription.para: Sets the preview mode which should be used to modify the view's appearance.

detaileddescription.para:
Preview modes are only used if previewModeEnabled() is true.
setPreviewModeEnabled()
previewMode()

briefdescription.para: Sets whether a preview effect should be used to alter the view's appearance.

parameterdescription.para: Set to true to enable the preview effect on the view.

briefdescription.para: Sets a section label, to display above the first page shown in the view.
Sets the tool currently being used in the view.
Sets a vertical ruler to synchronize with the view state.
Sets the zoom level for the view, where a zoom level of 1.0 corresponds to 100%.
Returns the currently active tool for the view.
Unsets the current view tool, if it matches the specified tool.

detaileddescription.para: This is called from destructor of view tools to make sure that the tool won't be used any more. You don't have to call it manually, QgsLayoutViewTool takes care of it.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of page numbers for pages which are currently visible in the view.
Returns a list of page items which are currently visible in the view.
Delete the specified items.
Deletes all selected items.
Deselects all items in the view.
Emits the zoomLevelChanged() signal.

detaileddescription.para: This should be called after calling any of the QGraphicsView base class methods which alter the view's zoom level, i.e. QGraphicsView::fitInView().

briefdescription.para: Groups all selected items.
Inverts the current selection, selecting deselected items and deselecting and selected items.
Locks any selected items, preventing them from being interacted with by mouse interactions.
Lowers the selected items down the z-order.
Lowers the selected items to the bottom of the z-order.
Raises the selected items to the top of the z-order.
Pushes a new status bar message to the view.

detaileddescription.para:
This causes statusMessage() to be emitted, which should cause the message to appear in the status bar for the parent window.
statusMessage()

briefdescription.para: Raises the selected items up the z-order.
Selects all items in the view.
Selects the next item above the existing selection, by item z order.
Selects the next item below the existing selection, by item z order.
Ungroups all selected items.
Unlocks all locked items in the layout.
Updates associated rulers and other widgets after view extent or zoom has changed.

detaileddescription.para: This should be called after calling any of the QGraphicsView base class methods which alter the view's zoom level or extent, i.e. QGraphicsView::fitInView().

briefdescription.para: Zooms to the actual size of the layout.
Zooms the view to the full extent of the layout.
Zooms in to the view by a preset amount.
Zooms out of the view by a preset amount.
Zooms the view to the full width of the layout.
Is emitted when the mouse cursor coordinates change within the view.

detaileddescription.para: The layoutPoint argument indicates the cursor position within the layout coordinate system.

briefdescription.para: Emitted when an item is "focused" in the view, i.e.

detaileddescription.para: it becomes the active item and should have its properties displayed in any designer windows.

briefdescription.para: Emitted when a layout is set for the view.
Emitted when the page visible in the view is changed.

detaileddescription.para:
This signal considers the page at the center of the view as the current visible page.
currentPage()

briefdescription.para: Emitted when the view has a message for display in a parent window's status bar.
Emitted when the current tool is changed.
Emitted in the destructor when the view is about to be deleted, but is still in a perfectly valid state.
Is emitted whenever the zoom level of the view is changed.
Zoom layout from a mouse wheel event.
A graphical widget to display and interact with QgsLayouts.

detaileddescription.para: QgsLayoutView manages the layout interaction tools and mouse/key events.
